title: WHY IS RIOT TRYING TO CONDITION US TO THE IMAGE OF CHEMTRAILS/GEOENGINEERING???
body:
Riot, please tell us why you are involving yourself in the brainwashing and manipulation of the masses to ignore and be ignorant of things such as - what their governments affiliates are spraying in our skies?

A hint as to ingredients of these chemicals polluting the airways
Barium
Strontium
Aluminum
Mitotoxins
Desiccated human blood cells and much more....

replies.body:
LOL WUT

what does that have to do with League, but yes it is true what they are doing to the skies but still WTF DOES IT HAVE TO DO WITH LEAGUE

Chemical trails can appear in ANY temperature, what you are reffering to is the contrial theory.

Contrails, which are water vapour appear only in high humidity low temp.
Maybe the artist doesn't know this and were thinking they were just adding a contrail? Or they could just be unwittingly involved.

This is a possibility, a lot of the pilots involved in this are actually under contracts and are unable to say anything for fear of financial instability, fear for their families lives and fear for their own.

We're a part of something much bigger than most of you understand.

When the time comes I hope you all can find it within yourselves to see what it is that you've missed this whole time.


( not specifically just you Sunlit Earth )

I just remembered a "clean skies" and "stop poisoning us" manifestation near the airport where i'm from, with the industrial black smoke columns from the industrial area on the far background.
Chemtrail people are the best.

(ps. did you know it started as an insurance scam?)
I'm not quite sure if what you're saying is that you agree with what they're saying or that you believe that they are being disingenuous.

The history of scams is actually a pretty good source of material when you're trying to improve in illusionism.
I'm an illusionist by hobby, the talk is the hardest part to work on. That's why this stuff gets my interest, i need to get people to believe impossible stuff, and these guys (some of them) are good at it.
Ofc the basic technique is pretty simple, but it's the actual implementation that matters.
...not sure if you're following.
how is that geophysics/structural geeology (geoengineering as your called it)

This thread is cancer, and i mean more cancer than most other types of cancer.
Even i find this Cancer.
Cancer
Look at the picture shown below the first one in the background near where Kha zix is jumping off the board

> [{quoted}](name=Enlightened One,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=pFwfvTsW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-30T00:57:54.093+0000)
>
> Look at the picture shown below the first one in the background near where Kha zix is jumping off the board

i see it its just a cloud lol a trail is long that is quite short, since its summer it can't be a chem trail because it wouldn't be cold enough for it to appear
Also, if you look close enough you can see the shadow of a plane....

It's all {{champion:42}} and {{champion:27}} they are working together to pollute valorans atmospheres and control the general populations minds, now that we all know their secret they will come for us so... RUN!
